oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Small Portrait Photograph of Robert F. Hodge, 1917
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Small portrait photograph of Robert F. Hodge with 'Entrance 1917' written underneath. It is identical to the image in Hodge's military identification card. On the back is written: "To my beloved."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Robert Frank Hodge World War I Papers, 1914-1919
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: American Field Service; World War, 1914-1918
Portrait photographs
